{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3552172,"name":"Teddy","username":"dragonblade316","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/dragonblade316/{size}/211424_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-09T21:45:51.614Z","cooked":"

Title says it all.

I‚Äôm just an alum who is curious since questnav seems to bring a lot of great benefits but I don‚Äôt see a lot of teams using it outside of my old team and ninjaneers.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-09T21:45:51.614Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":50,"reads":747,"readers_count":746,"score":429.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Teddy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":62239,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"That one guy obsessed with programming"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/1","custom_user_title":"That one guy obsessed with programming","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3552178,"name":"Dan Katzuv","username":"dan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/eada6e/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-09T21:55:25.126Z","cooked":"

It was only released in the last off-season so didn‚Äôt have any competition testing. After we‚Äôve seen it‚Äôs quite good, we thought of buying a headset and trying it, but this season we‚Äôve finally got vision processing working so we‚Äôll probably not try it and do other projects in the next offseason.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-09T21:55:48.496Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":740,"readers_count":739,"score":148.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Dan Katzuv","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32004,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/2","custom_user_title":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552179,"name":"Sam","username":"Sam948","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sam948/{size}/261363_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-09T21:58:01.515Z","cooked":"

We‚Äôre not using it due to the novelty, (released right before this season) and because we don‚Äôt have the time to test and integrate it. We‚Äôre looking into it for next season, but that‚Äôs more of a fun offseason project than a guarantee. From what I‚Äôve seen, it seems to be very well done, but I haven‚Äôt used it so that doesn‚Äôt mean much.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-09T21:58:01.515Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":724,"readers_count":723,"score":144.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Sam","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63767,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"8847A | PV"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/3","custom_user_title":"8847A | PV","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552436,"name":"Eric (319)","username":"EKM_319","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ekm_319/{size}/230932_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T01:52:43.486Z","cooked":"

Seems neat.

But it was unproven in competition and our team is small enough to not be able to take the risk in season to develop it.?

We still hadn‚Äôt fully mastered the tools we have available to us at the time of the season starting ( a stock of limelights from late last season )

Don‚Äôt get me wrong though. i love the idea of using something i can buy at walmart for half the cost of a limelight and has a ton of R&D put into it for a non FRC use. it‚Äôll never be ‚Äòunobtanium‚Äô

and (from memory only ) if it doesn‚Äôt require a co-processor (90% sure it doesn‚Äôt ) it‚Äôs one less thing to worry about as well.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T01:52:43.486Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":653,"readers_count":652,"score":135.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Eric (319)","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":23786,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Awaiting our Robot Overlords since 2013"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/4","custom_user_title":"Awaiting our Robot Overlords since 2013","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552441,"name":"Chase Eid","username":"PixL","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/pixl/{size}/250824_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T01:57:32.223Z","cooked":"

We are still not sure how the starting position works, and how the headset knows where it is before match starts. I‚Äôm assuming it relies on other systems or beginning in the same spot, which is much less flexible then cameras. We could be mistaken. If it is based on starting position, then the accuracy is as good as the robot placement.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T01:57:32.223Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":576,"readers_count":575,"score":115.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Chase Eid","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":69000,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552454,"name":"s-neff","username":"s-neff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/s-neff/{size}/9062_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T02:08:26.575Z","cooked":"

Too much novelty. Novelty is schedule risk. Schedule risk derails readiness, which doesn‚Äôt meet team competitiveness goals.

If our team goals were more experiential than competitive, it could have swung the other direction.

The tech is super cool, going to play with it in the off-season.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T02:08:53.596Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":544,"readers_count":543,"score":188.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"s-neff","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":5}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":28019,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":5}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":5,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552493,"name":"Totally out of touch","username":"AdamHeard","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/adamheard/{size}/195262_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T02:53:27.235Z","cooked":"

What is questnav

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T02:53:27.235Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":501,"readers_count":500,"score":370.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Totally out of touch","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":17}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":3609,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":13},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":17,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552495,"name":"John Fogarty","username":"JohnFogarty","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/johnfogarty/{size}/267052_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T02:55:32.718Z","cooked":"

I mean on a real field it isn‚Äôt quite reliable yet. I‚Äôve seen data from questnav logged from an event this past weekend.

I‚Äôm willing to try some new things, but quest nav was outside of my comfort zone.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T02:56:03.953Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":485,"readers_count":484,"score":117.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"John Fogarty","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":12688,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552499,"name":"Teddy","username":"dragonblade316","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/dragonblade316/{size}/211424_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T03:05:51.416Z","cooked":"

It‚Äôs a new piece of software that allows the robot to find where it is on the field using the location tracking on a meta quest 3 or 3a.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T03:05:51.416Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":464,"readers_count":463,"score":122.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Teddy","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":3609,"username":"AdamHeard","name":"Totally out of touch","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/adamheard/{size}/195262_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":62239,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"That one guy obsessed with programming"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/9","custom_user_title":"That one guy obsessed with programming","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552501,"name":"Jim Sokoloff","username":"sokoloff","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sokoloff/{size}/231724_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T03:06:16.424Z","cooked":"

We might be philosophically in Late Majority, but in practice we‚Äôre closer to Laggards right now.

QuestNav is on the extreme left side of this graphic and we aren‚Äôt.

image1200√ó662 84.1 KB

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T03:06:16.424Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":460,"readers_count":459,"score":122.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Jim Sokoloff","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66298,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"97 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/10","custom_user_title":"97 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552538,"name":"","username":"Crafter","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/77aa72/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T04:20:22.104Z","cooked":"
JohnFogarty:

I‚Äôve seen data from questnav logged from an event this past weekend.

Are you able to share this data?

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T04:20:22.104Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":425,"readers_count":424,"score":110.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55818,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/11","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552541,"name":"evanperryg","username":"evanperryg","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/evanperryg/{size}/259696_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T04:33:41.081Z","cooked":"

Works better than limelight, costs less than limelight. The only ‚Äúunproven‚Äù tech is the thing in between the insanely advanced camera array and IMUs, and the Rio. Still not for the faint of heart.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T04:34:46.836Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":401,"readers_count":400,"score":140.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"evanperryg","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":20861,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1732 ‚Üê 3007 ‚Üê 2338"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/12","custom_user_title":"1732 ‚Üê 3007 ‚Üê 2338","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"question","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"thinking","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552547,"name":"John Fogarty","username":"JohnFogarty","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/johnfogarty/{size}/267052_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T04:55:11.950Z","cooked":"

It‚Äôs not my data to share.

The logs I saw were from 4451‚Äôs robot.
4451 makes their entire codebase public and I was told the logs would be uploaded/shared after this weekend so I assume that information will be available soon.

EKM_319:

and (from memory only ) if it doesn‚Äôt require a co-processor (90% sure it doesn‚Äôt ) it‚Äôs one less thing to worry about as well.

Saying it doesn‚Äôt require a coprocessor isn‚Äôt really accurate. The Quest itself is the coprocessor along with housing the sensors used for tracking similar to say a limelight.

If I was a rookie team not invested into multiple limelights, I would definitely explore questnav for my team. If something is not a win condition level game changer(you can already achieve what you want vision wise with LL), the adoption will be slow IMO.

","post_number":18,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T12:52:29.883Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":278,"readers_count":277,"score":85.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Matt Boehm","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":19742,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/18","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552666,"name":"Curt Rozeboom","username":"BlueEpiphone","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/blueepiphone/{size}/197122_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T13:39:41.487Z","cooked":"
  1. We have students who are really enthusiastic about trying it out and getting it to work. Definitely not a mentor led effort, lol, but certainly want to support students who want to stand out.
  2. We wanted something that could help us overcome pose-reliability issues with respect to wheel-skid and be able to better track path-following. If this hadn‚Äôt come out, we might have pursued that similar to how Orbit does it as a way to innovate.
  3. We did some early tests on reliability and robustness that met our criteria for sticking with it.
  4. The team was supportive of taking a chance of something innovative that might lead to longer term success and that would help us stand out in the crowd.
  5. We expected to be able to fallback on raw driving ability or simpler auto techniques if we couldn‚Äôt translate practice field success to in-match success.
","post_number":19,"post_type":1,"posts_count":29,"updated_at":"2025-03-10T13:39:41.487Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":277,"readers_count":276,"score":85.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":494882,"topic_slug":"teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not","display_username":"Curt Rozeboom","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32089,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5010 Programming Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/teams-who-chose-to-use-or-not-to-use-questnav-why-or-why-not/494882/19","custom_user_title":"5010 Programming Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3552678,"name":"Owen Busler","username":"Owen_Busler","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/owen_busler/{size}/7684_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-10T13:54:42.500Z","cooked":"

8513 had a discussion about it when we saw the release. We worked a lot on our OrangePi/Arducam/PhotonVision setup in the offseason and decided that based off the april tag positions on the field we would decide if we needed QuestNav. When the game was released we were very happy with the tags on the field so we stuck with what we were more comfortable with. If the tags had been sparce it would have been a different discussion.
